org.ensembl.util
Class PropertiesUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.ensembl.util.PropertiesUtil
public class PropertiesUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Convenience class offering methods for easily accessing property files stored as files available via file system or URL. Makes it easy to extract single property values or all of them as a property object.

Constructor Detail

PropertiesUtil

public PropertiesUtil()
Method Detail

createProperties

public static java.util.Properties createProperties(java.lang.String[] propertyFiles)
Creates property object from propertyFiles. Firstly attempts to open each propertyFile as a file, secondly attempts to open it as a resource (available via CLASSPATH).

Returns:
property object corresponding to contents of files (empty if can't open files or files are empty).

createProperties

public static java.util.Properties createProperties(java.lang.String propertyFile)
Creates property object from propertyFile(s). Firstly attempts to open property as a file, secondly attempts to open it as a resource (available via CLASSPATH).

Parameters:
propertyFile - list of 1 or more files separated by commas.
Returns:
property object corresponding to file, or null if can't open file.

stringToURL

public static java.net.URL stringToURL(java.lang.String file)
Attempts to convert file location into a URL corresponding to a file in the local filesystem or in the classpath. First looks for a File with that filepath, then looks in the classpath.

Parameters:
file - file location.
Returns:
URL corresponding to file if it exists, otherwise null.

createProperties

public static java.util.Properties createProperties(java.net.URL url)
Creates property object from url.

Returns:
property object corresponding to file, or null if can't open resource.

getProperty

public static java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String propertyFile,
                                           java.lang.String key)
Returns:
value corresponding to key from file, null if can't open file or key not present.

getProperty

public static java.lang.String getProperty(java.net.URL url,
                                           java.lang.String key)
Returns:
value corresponding to key from url, null if can't open file or key not present.

booleanValue

public static boolean booleanValue(java.util.Properties properties,
                                   java.lang.String propertyName,
                                   boolean defaultValue)
Returns:
true if property value is is "true" (case insensitive), false if value is not "true", _default_ if proerty not set.

toString

public static java.lang.String toString(java.util.Properties p)
Sorts pairs by key name and prints one name = value pair per line.

filterOnPrefix

public static java.util.Properties filterOnPrefix(java.lang.String prefix,
                                                  java.util.Properties in)
Filters the input set of properties only allowing those with keys that begin with _prefix_.

Parameters:
prefix - key prefix to filter on.
in - input properties
Returns:
new properties object containing a subset of _in_ matching the condition.

removeKeyPrefix

public static java.util.Properties removeKeyPrefix(java.lang.String prefix,
                                                   java.util.Properties in)
Removes the string _prefix_ from the beggining pf any key that bigins with it.

Parameters:
prefix - prefix to be removed from the beginning of any keys which begin with it.
in - input properties
Returns:
new properties object containing the same key to value values as _in_ except that all keys beginning with the _prefix_ will have been modified.

writeToFile

public static void writeToFile(java.util.Properties props,
                               java.lang.String fileName,
                               java.lang.String pat)
Write some properties to file. Optionally filter on property name.

Parameters:
props - The properties to write.
fileName - The file to write to.
pat - If not null, only properties whose names match this string will be written.

stringToProperties

public static java.util.Properties stringToProperties(java.lang.String string,
                                                      java.lang.String separatorRegexp)
Convenience method for creating a properties object from a string.

Parameters:
string - string to be converted into a properties object. Format of string is name=value pairs separated by _separatorRegexp_. Can be null. e.g. "a=1:b=2".
separatorRegexp - separator regular expression, e.g. ":", ";"
Returns:
properties object representation of the string or null if _string_ is null.
